document_data.name: Nathair's mischief
document_data.mainbody: '''''Nathair's mischief''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[bard]]s, [[sorcerer]]s, and [[wizard]]s to disorient their opponents.
document_data.Effects:
This spell designated an area of effect, then randomly cycled through four possible effects, selecting one every ten minutes:
*The area was filled with the smell of apple pie which [[charm]]ed all creatures present
*Several bouquets of flowers appeared that squirted water at anyone who went near them
*Creatures in the area become incapacitated with giggling 
*The area was filled with floating droplets of molasses, making it hard to move
document_data.Components: The spell required [[verbal]], [[somatic]], and [[material component]]s. The material required was a piece of pie crust.
